name: money
description: Universal payment SDK for AI agents

scripts.bundle: npm run build:sdk && esbuild dist/src/index.js --bundle --platform=node --format=esm --banner:js="import { createRequire } from 'module'; import { fileURLToPath as __fp } from 'url'; import { dirname as __dn } from 'path'; const require = createRequire(import.meta.url); const __filename = __fp(import.meta.url); const __dirname = __dn(__filename);" --outfile=public/money.bundle.js && shasum -a 256 public/money.bundle.js > public/money.bundle.js.sha256
